snippet: The race between three Republicans appeared at first to be far too close to call, delighting the people who had been promising viewers and readers a dramatic start to the 2012 voting season.
abstract: Race between Ron Paul, Mitt Romney and Rick Santorum in the Iowa Republican caucuses appeared at first too close to call, catching nation's television news anchors by surprise.
lead_paragraph: The race between three Republicans appeared at first to be far too close to call, delighting the people who had been promising viewers and readers a dramatic start to the 2012 voting season.

headline.seo: Tight G.O.P. Race in Iowa Catches TV Anchors by Surprise
headline.main: Tight Race Catches TV Anchors by Surprise
headline.print_headline: Tight Race Catches TV Anchors By Surprise
